content:
TITLE: Executing DDL in R using CommonDataModel
DESCRIPTION: This code snippet demonstrates how to execute DDL statements to create CDM tables in a database schema using the CommonDataModel package in R.  The `executeDdl` function takes the connection details created by `DatabaseConnector`, the CDM version, and the target database schema as parameters. This will instantiate the tables directly in the database.
SOURCE: https://github.com/ohdsi/commondatamodel/blob/main/README.md#_snippet_6

LANGUAGE: R
CODE:
```
CommonDataModel::executeDdl(connectionDetails = cd,
                            cdmVersion = "5.4",
                            cdmDatabaseSchema = "ohdsi_demo"
                            )
```

----------------------------------------

TITLE: Building CDM Release DDLs in R
DESCRIPTION: This code snippet demonstrates how to use the `buildRelease` function in the CommonDataModel package to generate DDL scripts for a specified CDM version and target SQL dialect.  The `cdmVersions` parameter specifies the CDM version to generate DDLs for, `targetDialects` specifies the SQL dialect, and `outputfolder` specifies the directory where the generated DDL files will be saved. This generates the text files required to build the database.
SOURCE: https://github.com/ohdsi/commondatamodel/blob/main/README.md#_snippet_3

LANGUAGE: R
CODE:
```
CommonDataModel::buildRelease(cdmVersions = "5.4",
                              targetDialects = "postgresql",
                              outputfolder = "/pathToOutput")
```

----------------------------------------

TITLE: Connecting to a Database in R using DatabaseConnector
DESCRIPTION: This code snippet demonstrates how to create connection details for a PostgreSQL database using the DatabaseConnector package in R.  It uses the `createConnectionDetails` function to specify the database management system (dbms), server address, username, password, and path to the JDBC driver. These connection details are then used to connect to the database and execute DDL statements.
SOURCE: https://github.com/ohdsi/commondatamodel/blob/main/README.md#_snippet_5

LANGUAGE: R
CODE:
```
cd <- DatabaseConnector::createConnectionDetails(dbms = "postgresql",
                                                 server = "localhost/ohdsi",
                                                 user = "postgres",
                                                 password = "postgres",
                                                 pathToDriver = "/pathToDriver"
                                                 )
```

----------------------------------------

TITLE: Installing CommonDataModel from GitHub in R
DESCRIPTION: This code snippet demonstrates how to install the CommonDataModel package from GitHub using the `devtools` package in R. The `install.packages` function is used to install `devtools`, and then `devtools::install_github` is used to install CommonDataModel from the OHDSI GitHub repository. This is a prerequisite for using the CDM R package.
SOURCE: https://github.com/ohdsi/commondatamodel/blob/main/README.md#_snippet_0

LANGUAGE: R
CODE:
```
install.packages("devtools")
devtools::install_github("OHDSI/CommonDataModel")
```

----------------------------------------

TITLE: Installing DatabaseConnector from GitHub in R
DESCRIPTION: This code snippet shows how to install the DatabaseConnector package from GitHub. This package is required as a dependency to establish a connection to a database in order to execute DDL statements directly from R. `DatabaseConnector` facilitates connecting to different database types.
SOURCE: https://github.com/ohdsi/commondatamodel/blob/main/README.md#_snippet_4

LANGUAGE: R
CODE:
```
devtools::install_github("ohdsi/DatabaseConnector")
```

----------------------------------------

TITLE: Listing Supported SQL Dialects in R
DESCRIPTION: This code snippet demonstrates how to list the supported SQL dialects in the CommonDataModel package using the `listSupportedDialects` function.  No arguments are required. It returns a list of the supported database dialects for which the package can generate DDL scripts.
SOURCE: https://github.com/ohdsi/commondatamodel/blob/main/README.md#_snippet_1

LANGUAGE: R
CODE:
```
CommonDataModel::listSupportedDialects()
```

----------------------------------------

TITLE: Listing Supported CDM Versions in R
DESCRIPTION: This code snippet demonstrates how to list the supported CDM versions in the CommonDataModel package using the `listSupportedVersions` function. It is a utility function used to determine what versions of the Common Data Model are supported by the package.
SOURCE: https://github.com/ohdsi/commondatamodel/blob/main/README.md#_snippet_2

LANGUAGE: R
CODE:
```
CommonDataModel::listSupportedVersions()
```
